articles.title: Jerome Powell's pitch for a second term: America can't afford runaway inflation - CNN
articles.description: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell is pledging not to allow inflation to become ingrained in the American economy, according to prepared remarks released on Monday.
articles.content:
New York (CNN)Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell is pledging not to allow inflation to become ingrained in the American economy, according to prepared remarks released on Monday.

articles.title: 'Victims on every floor': 9 kids among 19 dead in New York fire - CNA
articles.description:
NEW YORK CITY: Nine children were among at least 19 people killed and dozens injured when a fire tore through a high-rise apartment building in New York on Sunday (Jan 9) in one of America's worst residential fires in recent memory.
